package.name: glibc_pass1
package.build:
if [ '!' -r /usr/include/rpc/types.h ]; then echo 'RPC headers missing in host system!' exit 1 fi
cd glibc-build
case `uname -m` in i?86) echo "CFLAGS += -march=i486 -mtune=generic" > configparms ;; x86_64) echo "CFLAGS += -march=x86-64 -mtune=generic" > configparms ;; esac
JOBS=` grep -c processor /proc/cpuinfo ` # Settings for Raspberry Pi case ${LFS_TGT} in *armv6l*) JOBS=1 ;; esac
../glibc-${PKGVERSION}/configure --prefix=/tools \ --host=${LFS_TGT} \ --build=$(../glibc-2.19/scripts/config.guess) \ --disable-profile \ --enable-kernel=2.6.32 --with-headers=/tools/include \ libc_cv_forced_unwind=yes\ libc_cv_c_cleanup=yes \ libc_cv_ctors_header=yes && make -j $JOBS
package.install:
if [ '!' -r /usr/include/rpc/types.h ]; then echo 'RPC headers missing in host system!' exit 1 fi
cd glibc-build make install echo 'main(){}' > dummy.c $LFS_TGT-gcc dummy.c readelf -l a.out | grep ': /tools'
